title: What are the most interesting and enjoyable English songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well it varies from person to person, in any case though, here are a few songs which I feel like the most enjoyable listening to: Happy- Pharrell WilliamsJust Can’t get Enough- Black Eyed PeasHymn for the Weekend- ColdplayRadio Ga Ga- QueenCounting Stars- One RepublicCan’t stop the Feeling- Justin TimberlakeGlad You Came- The WantedMoves Like Jagger- Maroon 5 and Christina AguileraParty Rock Anthem- LMFAOSugar- Maroon 5Billionaire- Bruno Mars and Travie McCoyOn Top of the World- Imagine DragonsEenie Meenie- Sean Kingston and Justin BeiberFire Burning- Sean KingstonRum and Raybans- Sean KingstonDon’t Stop the Music- RihannaCheap Thrills- Sia and Sean KingstonOne Love- BlueNext Episode- Dr Dre, Snoop Dogg, Kurupt and Nate DoggKush- Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg and 50 CentStill D.R.E- Dr. Dre and Snoop DoggReal Slim Shady- EminemSorry, for putting up a long list -.-’ but I don’t incline just to one type of genre, except only on one thing, the song should have a good rhythm to it, the words are decently matched and voila, that could be my favorite song.
It depends on your taste of songs, like every one will have different choice of songs. Like for me- Alan Walker and Selena Gomez are top artists you must go through there songs
